name: ListSquareCustomers
description:
Retrieve customer profiles from a Square account.

Use this tool to obtain a list of customer profiles linked to a Square account. This is helpful for managing and analyzing customer data. Customer profiles may take some time to update, especially during network issues.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: A pagination cursor to retrieve the next set of customer profiles. Use a cursor from a previous query call to fetch subsequent results.

value_schema.description:
A pagination cursor returned by a previous call to this endpoint.
Provide this cursor to retrieve the next set of results for your original query.

For more information, see [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination).

parameters.name: maximum_results_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of customer profiles to return in a single page. Must be between 1 and 100, inclusive.

value_schema.description:
The maximum number of results to return in a single page. This limit is advisory. The response might contain more or fewer results.
If the specified limit is less than 1 or greater than 100, Square returns a `400 VALUE_TOO_LOW` or `400 VALUE_TOO_HIGH` error. The default value is 100.

For more information, see [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination).

parameters.name: customer_sorting_field
parameters.description: Specify how customer profiles should be sorted. Options are `DEFAULT` or `CREATED_AT`. Default is `DEFAULT`.

value_schema.description:
Indicates how customers should be sorted.

The default value is `DEFAULT`.

parameters.name: customer_sort_order
parameters.description: Specifies whether to sort customers in ascending ('ASC') or descending ('DESC') order. Default is 'ASC'.

value_schema.description:
Indicates whether customers should be sorted in ascending (`ASC`) or
descending (`DESC`) order.

The default value is `ASC`.

parameters.name: include_total_customer_count
parameters.description: Set to true to include the total count of customers in the response. The default is false.

value_schema.description:
Indicates whether to return the total count of customers in the `count` field of the response.

The default value is `false`.
